00059 int main(int argC, char* argV[])
00060 {
00061         FileUtil *fileUtil = NULL;  
00062         try{
00063                 if( argC != 2) throw ErrorClass( "there must be exactly one command line argument which should be the file name");
00064                 fileUtil = new FileUtil(); 
00065                 time_t start, finish, tmp;
00066                 std::string osilFileNameWithPath;
00067                 std::string osilFileName;
00068                 std::string osil;
00069                 std::string uploadResult;

00072                 std::cout << "FILE NAME = " << argV[1] << std::endl;
00073                 std::cout << "Read the file into a string" << std::endl;

00088                 int slength = osilFileNameWithPath.size();
00089                 osilFileName = osilFileNameWithPath.substr( index + 1, slength) ;

00091                 std::cout << "Place remote synchronous call" << std::endl;

00093                 //std::cout << "osil =  " << osil << std::endl;

00097                 std::cout << "File Upload took (seconds): "<< difftime(finish, start) << std::endl;
